title: Job Openings at Yomfield Nursery and Primary School
content:
Yomfield Nursery and Primary school is located at Tejumola Estate, opposite Police post, Obantoko, Abeokuta, Ogun State. It was founded in September 1996 with the main motive of providing educational services to all Nigerians, At the moment there is a Daycare unit along with the Nursery and Primary sections. It is a day school primarily established with a view to bringing children up to cradle through the play way method as a route to other methods in order to prepare them for future roles in the society.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Account Officer

Job Location: Abeokuta, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Managing and maintaining up-to-date student fee payment records.
	Issuance of invoices, receipts, and payment reminders to parents/guardians.
	Preparing monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports for management.
	Working with auditors during audits and ensure accurate financial reporting.
	Ensuring compliance with statutory tax and pension regulations (e.g., PAYE, VAT, etc.)
	Liaising with banks and other financial institutions as needed.
	Monitoring school budgets and ensure adherence to financial plans.
	Reconciling bank statements and school financial accounts regularly.
	Handling payroll processing and staff salary administration.
	Assisting in procurement, vendor payment, and inventory control.
	Maintaining strict confidentiality of all financial data.
	Provide financial support and analysis for school projects and capital expenses.


Qualifications & Experience


	B.Sc / HND in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline.
	Minimum of 2 - 3 years of experience in a similar role (preferably in an academic institution).
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g.,Excel etc.).
	Professional certification (e.g., ICAN, ACA, ACCA) is an added advantage.


Key Skills:


	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Good interpersonal and communication skills.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work independently and within a team.
	Integrity and strong ethical standards.
	Time management and organizational skills.


Salary
N80,000 - N90,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 26th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: ysrecruitment03@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) English Teacher

Job Location: Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Teaching specialized subject(s) to students in designated classes.
	Attending to all assigned classes regularly and punctually.
	Conducting class tests, periodic tests, practical/projects, homework etc on a regular basis and marking all exercise books while proper records obtained by students are kept as continuous assessment.
	Involvement in the conduct of afternoon session classes for students at designated times on the time-table.


Requirements


	Must possess at least B.Sc., B.Ed. in English Language or other related fields from reputable institutions.
	Must possess at least 2 years of cognate experience teaching specialized subject.
	Possess at least 2 years experience working as an English Language tutor.
	Sound understanding of the English Language primary school curriculum
	Analytical thinker with strong conceptual and problem-solving skills.
	Meticulous attention to detail with the superb organizational skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N80,000 / month. 

Application Closing Date: 28th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: ysrecruitment03@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) French Teacher

Job Location: Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Teaching specialized subject(s) to students in designated classes.
	Attending to all assigned classes regularly and punctually.
	Conducting class tests, periodic tests, practical/projects, homework etc on a regular basis and marking all exercise books while proper records obtained by students are kept as continuous assessment.
	Involvement in the conduct of afternoon session classes for students at designated times on the time-table.


Requirements


	Must possess at least B.Sc., B.Ed. in French Language or other related fields from reputable institutions.
	Must possess at least 2 years of cognate experience teaching specialized subject.
	Possess at least 2 years experience working as an French Language tutor.
	Sound understanding of the French Language primary school curriculum
	Analytical thinker with strong conceptual and problem-solving skills.
	Meticulous attention to detail with the superb organizational skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N80,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 28th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: ysrecruitment03@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Senior Manager Finance Job at Coca-Cola Company




        
    

        
        The Coca-Cola Company (NYSE: KO) is the world's largest beverage company, refreshing consumers with more than 500 sparkling and still brands. At The Coca-Cola Company you can cultivate your career in a challenging and dynamic environment. We are the largest manufacturer and distributor of nonalcoholic drinks in the world-selling more than 1 billion drinks a day. Unlock your full potential with a future-focused company that is known and respected throughout the world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Manager Finance

Job ID: R-127002
Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a Senior Finance Manager to join our Finance team.
	This role is key in supporting strategic financial initiatives to drive growth, profitability, and value creation across the Nigeria Region Franchise.


What you will Do


	Manage the Nigeria Region P&L, provide end-to-end financial analysis, including pro-actively managing risks & opportunities, providing predictability and to the extent possible, stability to the operation’s key financial performance metrics.
	Manage franchise (bottlers) and customer relationships at the local level
	Prepare innovative value chains to support system business case decisions.
	Partner with Marketing and Franchise teams on DFR(Deductions From Revenue) & DME (Direct Marketing Expense) management.
	Manage all Business Models and Margins within the Region.
	Support Financially with Scenario Planning of all RGM initiatives deployment at Region's level to optimize pricing and OBPPC (occasion, brand, package, price and channel) strategies.
	Provide insights and brainstorm with Bottlers on local business issues.
	Support internal stakeholders on ongoing negotiations, incidence calibrations etc.
	Partner with bottlers and customers to align financial plans and support joint business strategies.
	Provide insights into Revenue and Project Management Analysis.
	Analyze and Support Working Capital and Cash Management.


Role Requirements


	University Degree (Bachelor) or equivalent experience in Finance, Business Administration, or a related field.
	7+ years of prior relevant experience in commercial finance, financial analysis, and strategic planning.
	Proven experience in developing and monitoring budgets, analyzing financial data, and forecasting results.
	Mastery in financial modelling, cross-functional project management, and influencing decision-makers.
	Agile, Analytical and Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex financial information to various stakeholders.
	Experience in leading performance management for business P&L and providing relevant analytics and actionable insights
	Experience in driving engagement with senior leaders and supporting teams to drive cross-functional alignment across multiple stakeholders.
	Experience in managing Platform Services engagement for the business.
	Deep understanding of the financials and system economics comprising the Bottlers, customers through the lens of categories, packages, brands, and the competitive landscape.
